name: University & Course Selection
shortDesc: Personalized guidance to match your interests, career goals, and financial plans with the best universities in Australia.
longDesc: Our expert consultants help you choose the right university and course based on your academic background, career aspirations, and budget. We analyze your profile and recommend the best-fit options from top Australian universities.

faqs.q: How do you help me choose the right university?
faqs.a: We assess your academic profile, career goals, and budget to recommend universities and courses that best match your aspirations and financial situation.

faqs.q: Do you charge for university selection consultation?
faqs.a: Our initial consultation is free. We help you understand your options and guide you through the selection process.

name: Application Assistance
shortDesc: Step-by-step help with documentation, SOPs, and deadlines to ensure strong, compliant applications.
longDesc: We provide comprehensive support for your university application, including document preparation, Statement of Purpose (SOP) writing, reference letters, and ensuring all deadlines are met.

faqs.q: What documents do I need for university applications?
faqs.a: Typically, you'll need academic transcripts, English test scores, passport copy, SOP, reference letters, and financial documents. We provide a detailed checklist based on your chosen university.

faqs.q: Can you help me write my Statement of Purpose?
faqs.a: Yes, our team helps you craft a compelling SOP that highlights your strengths and aligns with university requirements.

name: Visa Consultation
shortDesc: End-to-end student visa support for Subclass 500 and other streams — fast, transparent, and compliant with DHA guidelines.
longDesc: Expert guidance for Australian student visa (Subclass 500) applications. We ensure all documentation is complete, compliant with Department of Home Affairs (DHA) requirements, and submitted correctly for faster processing.

faqs.q: How long does the student visa process take?
faqs.a: Australian student visa (Subclass 500) processing typically takes 2-4 weeks, but can vary based on individual circumstances and peak periods.
Genuine Temporary Entrant (GTE) statement explains your genuine intention to study in Australia temporarily. We help you write a compelling GTE statement.

name: Scholarship Guidance
shortDesc: Assistance identifying scholarships and fee waivers that best match your academic profile.
longDesc: We help you identify and apply for scholarships, grants, and fee waivers available for international students in Australia. Our team matches your profile with suitable opportunities and guides you through the application process.

faqs.q: What scholarships are available for Indian students?
faqs.a: Australian universities offer various scholarships including merit-based, need-based, and country-specific scholarships. We help identify the best options for your profile.

faqs.q: When should I apply for scholarships?
faqs.a: Scholarship deadlines often align with university application deadlines. We help you plan and apply early to maximize your chances.

name: Pre-Departure & Post-Arrival Support
shortDesc: We help you with accommodation, travel, insurance, and orientation — making your move stress-free.
longDesc: Comprehensive support before and after you arrive in Australia. From booking accommodation and travel arrangements to orientation and settling in, we ensure a smooth transition to your new academic life.

faqs.q: Do you help with finding accommodation?
faqs.a: Yes, we provide guidance on accommodation options including on-campus housing, homestays, and private rentals, and help you make informed decisions.

faqs.q: What support do you provide after I arrive?
faqs.a: We help with orientation, connecting you with local Indian student communities, and provide ongoing support for any questions or challenges you face.

name: IELTS & PTE Preparation
shortDesc: Expert-led test prep to help you achieve the scores your university requires.
longDesc: Comprehensive coaching for IELTS and PTE Academic tests. Our expert instructors help you understand test formats, practice effectively, and achieve the scores required by your chosen university.

faqs.q: Which test should I take - IELTS or PTE?
faqs.a: Both are accepted by Australian universities. We help you choose based on your strengths, test availability, and university requirements.
Score requirements vary by university and program. Typically, undergraduate programs require IELTS 6.0-6.5 or PTE 50-58, while postgraduate programs may require higher scores.
